title: Sarah Binion | Front-End Engineer
description: Iâ€™m Sarah Binion a Senior / Team Lead Front-End Engineer at Kin Insurance and Co-Organizer of Write/Speak/Code Chicago Chapter. I have over fifteen years solving problems with web technologies and design. My favorite things to geek out on are accessibilty and design systems but I also spend a lot of my time as Lead focusing on team dynamics and simplifying complicated ideas. If I dig deeper for the foundational 'why' of may career, I would say it centers on empowering autonomy though technology.
